original: A helmet crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned exoskeletons of fire ants.  Covers the entire head. fire-resistant and very durable.

ID: bot_flametank
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/World_On_Fire/items.json
类型为 TOOL

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#World_On_Fire→TOOL→bot_flametank

original: The exterminator tank shudders briefly and rolls away.
translation: 炽虫者坦克颤抖了一下，然后滚走了。
context:
ID: bot_flametank
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/World_On_Fire/items.json
类型为 TOOL

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#World_On_Fire→TOOL→bot_flametank

original: The incendiary skitterbot gives off a loud sharp beep, and shines a multitude of colored lights in your face!
translation: 掠行燃烧弹机器人发出一声响亮尖锐的哔哔声，并把大量的彩色光照在你的脸上!
context:
ID: bot_fireminebot
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/World_On_Fire/items.json
类型为 TOOL

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#World_On_Fire→TOOL→bot_fireminebot

original: The incendiary skitterbot shudders briefly and rolls away.
translation: 掠行燃烧弹机器人颤抖了一下，然后滚走了。
context:
ID: bot_fireminebot
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/World_On_Fire/items.json
类型为 TOOL

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#World_On_Fire→TOOL→bot_fireminebot

original: This body has swollen to immense proportions, but still manages to hold itself together with semi-congealed colorless liquid all over its bloated body.  It clumsily moves around, but somehow attacks with a large reserve of highly flammable liquid.
translation: 一只全身大部分都浮肿的丧尸，但是在他臃肿的身体里由于一些半凝固的易燃液体，仍然能够保持着大概的轮廓。它很笨拙地走动，但是会喷出一大滩的易燃液体来攻击。
context:
ID: mon_zombie_incendiary
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/World_On_Fire/monsters.json
类型为 MONSTER

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#World_On_Fire→MONSTER→mon_zombie_incendiary

original: This is an inactive explosive skitterbot. It resembles a dog size insect packed with explosives. Using this item involves placing it on the ground and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the robot will race towards enemies and explode.
translation: 这是一个未激活的掠行爆炸机器人。它有着狗一般的大小，而且里面装满了炸药。使用该物品以将它放置在地上并打开它，如果重新编程和布线成功，机器人将飞奔向敌人并爆炸。
context:
ID: bot_minebot
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/World_On_Fire/items.json
类型为 TOOL

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#World_On_Fire→TOOL→bot_minebot

original: This is an inactive exterminator robot. It resembles a security bot only armed with a flamethrower. Using this item involves placing it on the ground and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the robot will race towards enemies and torch them alive.
translation: 这是一个未激活的灭虫机器人。它就像一个只有喷火器的安全机器人。使用该物品以将它放置在地上并打开它，如果重新编程和布线成功，机器人将飞奔向敌人并把他们活活烧死。
context:
ID: bot_flamebot
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/World_On_Fire/items.json
类型为 TOOL

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#World_On_Fire→TOOL→bot_flamebot

original: This is an inactive exterminator tank. It resembles a large tank only armed with a flamethrower & napalm bomb launchers. Using this item involves placing it on the ground and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the tank will race towards enemies and torch them alive.
translation: 这是一个未激活的炽虫者坦克。它就像一个只配备了火焰喷射器和凝固汽油弹发射器的大型坦克。使用该物品以将它放置在地上并打开它，如果重新编程和布线成功，坦克将冲向敌人，并将他们活活烧死。
context:
ID: bot_flametank
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/World_On_Fire/items.json
类型为 TOOL

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#World_On_Fire→TOOL→bot_flametank

original: This is an inactive incendiary skitterbot. It resembles a dog size insect packed with incendiary explosives. Using this item involves placing it on the ground and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the robot will race towards enemies and explode.
translation: 这是一个未激活的掠行燃烧弹机器人。它有着狗一般的大小，里面装满了燃烧炸药。使用该物品以将它放置在地上并打开它，如果重新编程和布线成功，机器人将飞奔向敌人并爆炸。

ID: bot_fireminebot

类型为 TOOL

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#World_On_Fire→TOOL→bot_fireminebot

original: This once-human is visible only as a glowing crimson silhouette that you have to squint to see, cloaked in a  field of flames that flicker intensely. It walks slowly and deliberately, the raging inferno around it dances wildly.
translation: 这个丧尸如今只剩下一个发光的红色轮廓，你必须眯着眼睛才能透过那燃烧的火焰看见它的身影。它慢悠悠地走着，身体四周的火焰狂舞着。
context:

类型为 MONSTER

original: With its ember skin swollen to near rupture with methane gas, this cyst covered zombie looks like it could violently burst under the slightest of disturbances, and fire would probably be a very bad idea.
translation: 一具充满灰烬的皮肤下充满了臌胀的甲烷气体的尸体，隆起的皮肤遍布着黑色的血管，随时都可能爆出大量燃气，点火可能是一个非常糟糕的主意。
